name: Write word
description:
Write word - this is a simulator game for fast typing! During the game, you have for 5 seconds to remember the word that will appear on the screen, and then write the word. For each correctly entered character you will get +100 points, but if you enter the wrong character - then you will lose -100 points! Thus, this game trains your memory, as well as improves your typing skills on the keyboard!

Key game features:
- Develops memory!
- Trains your typing skills!
- Suitable for both children and adults!
- Minimalistic design!
- 300 words in the base game!
